sentence.Network_en: Finally her singleness of aim and her resolution won the day.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后,她始终不渝的目的和决心终于取得了胜利.

sentence.Network_en: She never called it the state of solitude, much less of singleness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她从来不认为这是孤僻, 更不是与世隔绝.

sentence.Network_en: To see her might bring back his singleness of intention, calm his exasperation, clear his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 看见她说不定会重新使他心思坚定,烦躁平息, 头脑清楚起来.
